**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 90 1.1 **Traditions** [Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3) **Cast** 30 minutes ([material](/Rules.aspx?ID=282), [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)) **Target** 1 item of 2 Bulk or less **Duration** 1 month --- You ward the target item against those who would steal it. When a creature attempts to take the target into its possession, it takes 8d8 mental damage and is [doomed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=9), depending on the result of its Will save. The spell then ends. You can choose up to 10 creatures when you cast this spell; if you do, those creatures can take the target item without triggering the ward. You can only have one _bandit's doom_ active at a time. If you cast the spell again, the newer casting supersedes the older. **Critical Success** The creature is unaffected.
**Success** The creature takes half damage and is doomed 1.
**Failure** The creature takes full damage and is doomed 2.
**Critical Failure** The creature takes double damage and is doomed 3. --- **Heightened (+2)** The damage increases by 2d8.
name: Bandit's Doom
